context_bundle.summary: IMPACT Framework for automation design: Identify high-value targets (time audit, pain point analysis), Map complete workflow (input-process-output, stakeholders, exceptions), Prioritize by value matrix (impact*frequency/complexity), Architect for flexibility (modular, config over hardcode), Create feedback loops (monitor/analyze/optimize/validate), Test and validate (unit/integration/UAT/load)

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Time audit 2 weeks -> find tasks >2hrs/week repetitive. 2. Map I-P-O + exceptions. 3. Score: (Impact*Freq)/Complexity. 4. Build modular. 5. Monitor metrics. 6. Pilot before rollout.
common_patterns: Discovery: What tasks do you wish you never had to do again?
